title: Mobile not work properly automatically shud down and switched off
Redmi note 7s
body: It was a very horrific experience .device had software problems .within 7 days it started misbehaving. Amazon refused to take it return . I was forced to accept defective piece. Customer care experience with Amazon was very poor.

title: Overall performance, camera quality and battery life is not good
body: Facing issues with phone screen after 6months, not goodin qualit and overall performance, screen turns off automatically most of the times when call received due to which unable to pick calls , phone overheats sometimes

title: Phone hangs
body: Phone hangs on a single app and it didn't work even after 2 hours

title: Good for basic use
body: Good battery backup but not a gaming mobile or heavy use mobile
